name: npc_dota_hero_nevermore
bio_loc: It is said that Nevermore the Shadow Fiend has the soul of a poet, and in fact he has thousands of them. Over the ages he has claimed the souls of poets, priests, emperors, beggars, slaves, philosophers, criminals and (naturally) heroes; no sort of soul escapes him. What he does with them is unknown. No one has ever peered into the Abysm whence Nevermore reaches out like an eel from among astral rocks. Does he devour them one after another? Does he mount them along the halls of an eldritch temple, or pickle the souls in necromantic brine? Is he merely a puppet, pushed through the dimensional rift by a demonic puppeteer? Such is his evil, so intense his aura of darkness, that no rational mind may penetrate it. Of course, if you really want to know where the stolen souls go, there's one sure way to find out: Add your soul to his collection. Or just wait for Nevermore.
hype_loc: Capturing souls from every kill he makes, Shadow Fiend is always gathering his power. Every assault, each carefully aimed raze that kills an enemy, brings him closer to unleashing his gathered souls in a deadly blast of scouring energy.
npe_desc_loc: Unleashes the souls of fallen enemies for damage

facets.description_loc: Presence of the Dark Lord temporarily reduces more armor after nearby enemy heroes are killed. Every hero kill increases Necromastery's max souls by {s:bonus_max_soul_increase_on_hero_kill} until Shadow Fiend dies.
facets.name: nevermore_lasting_presence

abilities.name: nevermore_shadowraze1
abilities.desc_loc: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
notes_loc: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.
abilities.shard_loc: Cooldown reduced by %cooldown_reduction_on_hero_hit%s per enemy hero.
facets_loc: Applies a stacking %movement_speed_debuff%%% movement speed and %attack_speed_debuff% attack speed debuff on enemies hit.

abilities.name: nevermore_frenzy
abilities.desc_loc: Shadow Fiend gains Bonus Attack Speed for %duration% seconds. For the duration of the effect, Shadow Fiend's Max Soul count is increased by %soul_cost%, but he loses that amount of souls after it is done.
notes_loc: Cannot be cast unless Shadow Fiend has enough souls to pay the cost.

abilities.name: nevermore_dark_lord
abilities.desc_loc: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
abilities.lore_loc: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.
notes_loc: Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.
abilities.shard_loc: Lowers nearby enemy magic resistance by 14%%.
facets_loc: Presence of the Dark Lord temporarily reduces more armor after nearby enemy heroes are killed.

abilities.name: nevermore_requiem
abilities.desc_loc:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for %requiem_slow_duration% seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of %requiem_slow_duration_max%. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.

Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
abilities.lore_loc: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
notes_loc: One line is generated from Shadow Fiend for every %requiem_soul_conversion% soul in his possession.
Fear and movement slow do not apply if the Requiem was released on death.
abilities.scepter_loc: Reduces cooldown and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.

abilities.name: nevermore_necromastery
abilities.desc_loc: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases %soul_release_tooltip%%% of them from bondage.
abilities.lore_loc: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.
notes_loc: Denies and neutral creeps also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.
Break disables the gaining of new stacks.
Break does not disable the bonuses from existing stacks.
abilities.shard_loc: Shadow Fiend gains an extra soul per kill. Shadow Fiend can consume a soul per attack to deal critical damage and fear the target.
facets_loc: Every hero kill increases max souls by %max_soul_increase_on_hero_kill% until Shadow Fiend dies.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_nevermore_frenzy_castspeed
talents.name_loc: Feast of Souls Grants +{s:bonus_cast_speed_pct}% Cast Speed
